title-part.text: CONTAINERS SPECIALLY ADAPTED FOR MEDICAL OR PHARMACEUTICAL PURPOSES
DEVICES OR METHODS SPECIALLY ADAPTED FOR BRINGING PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS INTO PARTICULAR PHYSICAL OR ADMINISTERING FORMS
DEVICES FOR ADMINISTERING FOOD OR MEDICINES ORALLY

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Containers specially adapted for medical or pharmaceutical purposes

reference.text: capsules or the like for oral use A61J3/07; specially adapted for surgical or diagnostic appliances or instruments A61B50/00;

CPC-specific-text.text: antithrombogenic treatment of articles for conditioning blood A61L33/00; devices for introducing media into or onto the body A61M;

reference.text: containers for radioactive substances G21F5/00
containers with special dispensing means therefor B65D83/04
blisters in general B65D75/36

title-part.text: for collecting, storing or administering blood, plasma or medical fluids

reference.text: multiple bags systems for separating or storing blood components A61M1/0209
syringe ampoules or carpules A61M5/28

CPC-specific-text.text: Flexible ampoules, the contents of which are expelled by squeezing

title-part.text: with means for holding samples of contents

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. provisions for hanging or shape retaining means
, e.g. inlet or outlet ports, filters or caps

reference.text: A61J7/00 takes precedence;
openers B65D, B67B7/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Containers with closing means, e.g. caps

reference.text: plugs for containers B65D51/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Permanent type, e.g. welded or glued
Locking means requiring key or combination to open the container
Containers with means for dispensing liquid medicaments in a filtered or sterile way, e.g. with bacterial filters
Containers with provisions for hanging, e.g. integral adaptations of the container

reference.text: accessories for hanging the container A61J1/16, A61M5/1414

CPC-specific-text.text: Containers characterised by specific material properties
with connection retaining means, e.g. thread or snap-fit
with friction fit, e.g. connecting tubes directly to a protruding port
Containers with shape retaining means, e.g. to support the structure of the container during emptying or filling
Cooled holders, e.g. for medications, insulin, blood, plasma

reference.text: containers with thermal insulation in general B65D81/38; ice-boxes F25D

title-part.text: Arrangements for indicating condition of container contents, e.g. sterile condition
fluids, e.g. from vial to syringe

CPC-specific-text.text: Accessories used in combination with means for transfer or mixing of fluids, e.g. for activating fluid flow, separating fluids, filtering fluid or venting
having three or more piercing ends
having tap means, e.g. tap means activated by sliding
Containers or vials which are to be joined to each other in order to mix their contents

reference.text: combinations of vial and syringe for mixing their contents A61J1/2096

CPC-specific-text.text: Containers having several compartments for products to be mixed
Combination of a vial and a syringe for transferring or mixing their contents

title-part.text: with means for metering the amount of fluid
Devices or methods specially adapted for bringing pharmaceutical products into particular physical or administering forms

reference.text: chemical aspects, see the relevant classes

CPC-specific-text.text: Compounding apparatus specially for enteral or parenteral nutritive solutions

reference.text: bottling liquids B67C

CPC-specific-text.text: Coating of tablets or the like

reference.text: coating of sweetmeats or confectionery A23G3/20; coating of granules in general B01J2/006
apparatus for printing on tablets or the like B41F17/36
pulverising in general B02C

title-part.text: into the form of pills, lozenges or dragees
into the form of capsules or similar small containers for oral use

CPC-specific-text.text: into the form of telescopically engaged two-piece capsules
Sealing capsules, e.g. rendering them tamper-proof
into the form of wafers or cachets

title-part.text: into the form of suppositories or sticks
into the form of compressed tablets

reference.text: tablet presses B30B11/00

title-part.text: Devices for administering medicines orally, e.g. spoons

reference.text: calibrated capacity measures for fluids or fluent solid material G01F19/00; weighing spoons G01G19/56

title-part.text: Arrangements for time indication or reminder for taking medicine

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices specially adapted for taking medicines
Sticks, e.g. lollipops with drug release
Swallow helping devices, e.g. tongue shields
Trays for holding or distributing medicines

reference.text: display trays A47F3/14; serving trays A47G23/06
with pill counting devices A61J7/02; with time indication A61J7/04; containers or packages with special means for dispensing contents B65D83/00

CPC-specific-text.text: for holding medicines in, or fixing medicines on, a tooth, e.g. holder containing medicines fixed on a tooth

reference.text: medicament applicators for teeth or gums A61C19/063

title-part.text: Arrangements for time indication or reminder for taking medicine, e.g. programmed dispensers

CPC-specific-text.text: with direct interaction with a dispensing or delivery system
resulting from removing a drug from, or opening, a container
for preventing drug dispensing during a predetermined time period
of the count-down type, i.e. counting down a predetermined interval after each reset
automatically changing in response to a schedule deviation by the patient

reference.text: vacuum bottles in general A47J41/02

CPC-specific-text.text: having elongated tubes, e.g. for drinking from bottle in upright position
having storage compartments, e.g. for storing a teat
having aesthetic features, e.g. toy-like or imitating a female breast
for supporting in a feeding position
for supporting only in a non-feeding position
characterised by the type of support
attachable to other devices or furniture, e.g. crib, commode or stroller
having additional ports, e.g. for connecting syringes or straws

reference.text: devices for administering medicines orally A61J7/00

CPC-specific-text.text: having means for regulating the flow rate
by size or shape of the opening
having means for incorporating a mother's scent
angled, e.g. in respect to the bottle
for improving rigidity, e.g. anti-bite-through or anti-collapsing
having orthodontic properties, e.g. for promoting correct teeth development
Puncturing tools, e.g. for creating an opening in the teat

reference.text: containers having several compartments for products to be mixed A61J1/2093

title-part.text: with means for fastening to bottles

CPC-specific-text.text: with interlocking means, e.g. protrusions or indentations on the teat

reference.text: breast-pumps A61M1/06

CPC-specific-text.text: Nasal or oral feeding-tubes, e.g. tube entering body through nose or mouth

reference.text: guide wires A61M25/09

CPC-specific-text.text: Feeding-tubes for delivery of nourishment to the mouth; Mouth pieces therefor

reference.text: breast-nipple shields A61J13/00; mouth pieces for drinking straws A47G21/185; straws to take medicine A61J7/0038, mouthpieces for tracheal tubes A61M16/0488
insertion tools or methods A61B17/34

CPC-specific-text.text: Parts, details or accessories for feeding-tubes

reference.text: external tubes from medical containers to a connector outside of the body A61M39/08

CPC-specific-text.text: Means for fixing the tube inside the body, e.g. balloons, retaining means

reference.text: holding devices holding in the body A61M25/04

CPC-specific-text.text: Retainers adjacent to a body opening to prevent that the tube slips through, e.g. bolsters
Expandable retainers inside body lumens of the enteral tract, e.g. fixing by radially contacting a lumen wall

reference.text: balloon catheters A61M25/10

CPC-specific-text.text: Means for fixing the tube outside of the body, e.g. by a special shape, by fixing it to the skin

reference.text: holding devices, e.g. on the body A61M25/02, mouthpieces for tracheal tubes A61M16/0488; transcutaneous access sites A61M39/0247

CPC-specific-text.text: fixing a tube end, i.e. tube not protruding the fixing means
fixing at an intermediate position on the tube, i.e. tube protruding the fixing means
Fixing means and tube being one part
Tubes feeding directly to the intestines, e.g. to the jejunum

reference.text: A61M1/00, A61M5/142, A61M25/1018 take precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: Sensor means, e.g. for sensing reflux, acidity or pressure

reference.text: sensors for diagnostic purposes A61B5/00; sensors for inflation control A61M25/1018

CPC-specific-text.text: for sensing parameters related to the patient
for sensing parameters related to the device

reference.text: tube valves A61M39/22

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61J17/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups A61J17/001, A61J17/02, A61J17/10, A61J17/101, A61J17/1011, A61J17/1012, A61J17/103, A61J17/105, A61J17/107, A61J17/109, A61J17/111, A61J17/1111, A61J17/1115, and A61J17/113.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/001 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61J17/00.
Group A61J17/001 is also impacted by reclassification into groups A61J17/10, A61J17/101, A61J17/1011, A61J17/1012, A61J17/103, A61J17/105, A61J17/107, A61J17/109, A61J17/111, A61J17/1111, A61J17/1115, and A61J17/113.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/02 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A61J17/00.
Group A61J17/02 is also impacted by reclassification into groups A61J17/10, A61J17/101, A61J17/1011, A61J17/1012, A61J17/103, A61J17/105, A61J17/107, A61J17/109, A61J17/111, A61J17/1111, A61J17/1115, and A61J17/113.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/10 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Emitting means, e.g. for emitting sound, light, scents or flavours

Group A61J17/101 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Emitting sound, e.g. having rattles or music boxes

Group A61J17/103 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.

Group A61J17/105 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/107 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/109 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Holders therefor, e.g. to prevent loss or to hold in place

Group A61J17/111 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: conjoined with soft cushions or toys

Group A61J17/1111 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A61J17/1115 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Protective covers therefor, e.g. for protecting during disuse

note.note-paragraph:
Group A61J17/113 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A61J17/00, A61J17/001, and A61J17/02.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Devices for receiving spittle, e.g. spittoons

reference.text: for dentists A61C17/14

title-part.text: Coring prevention means, e.g. for plug or septum piecing members
Extrusion means, e.g. for producing pharmaceutical forms
Device provided with specific sensor or indicating means
by shape or form, e.g. by using shape recognition
using icons or symbolic figures, e.g. by a graphical representation symbolising the type of pathology or the organ by an image
using magnetic or electronic identifications, e.g. chips, RFID, electronic tags
Audible labels, e.g. for pre-recorded info or messages
